Gradely wurde von einem Schüler, für Sch: Gradely was created by a student for students. I am happy if you have suggestions for improvement or when you have ideas. You are welcome to contact me at elias@eliasschneider.com.
pl1: The platforms and synchronization make Gradely unique. You can save your grades here, and at the same time your grades are on your other device!
Auf 'gradelyapp.com' kannst du Gradely f: On 'gradelyapp.com' can you download Gradely for all your devices.
Bist du sicher, dass du: Do you really want to delete
Hast du schon ein Account?: Do you have an account already?
Willkommen bei Gradely. Gradely hilft di: Welcome to gradely. Gradely helps you, to monitor your grades.
Deine Noten werden sicher in der Cloud g: Your grades are stored in the cloud. So you can add or view your grades on your Laptop, Handy or iPad.
Mehr Infos findest du in den Einstellung: More Informations can you find in the settings.
In den Einstellungen kannst du einstelle: In the settings you can manage, if your grades should display as an average or pluspoints.
Füge ein Semester hinzu. Keine Angst, di: Add a semester. No worries, you can delete or edit this semester later.
pl3: Download Gradely for your other devices.
noNetwork2: Because this app is cloud based, you need an active network connection.
contactSuccess2: Thanks for your message. I will contact you with this email:
pwResetSuccess1: An email to reset your password was sent. Please check also your spam folder.
contactError1: Unfortunately there is an error. You can try it later or you can contact me under elias@eliasschneider.com
contact1: Do you have a feature suggestion, an error to report or something else? You can contact me.
dreamGrade1: Your grade for the next exam should be:
gradelyP1: I invested a lot of time and money in this app. Of course I want, that this app is free. With gradely plus you can help me, so I can make this app better.
gradelyP5: Gradely Plus can only be bought on a mobile device. After the purchase, you have gradely on any of your devices.
gradelyPS2: Thank you so much for being a gradely plus user. Have fun!
custom2: looks empty here? more gradely plus features coming soon.
